document_title: Psoriatic arthritis: Causes, symptoms, treatment and prevention
subsection_content:
Experts recommend that patients with psoriatic arthritis need to add lots of fresh fruits and vegetables to their daily diet; Limit sugar and fat that cause inflammation; Focus on safe fat sources such as fish, nuts, etc.
The patient's diet should include fresh fruits and vegetables and fats from fish, nuts, etc.
